metadata.title: CVE-2023-22997 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 6.1.2, kernel/module/decompress.c misinterpretsthe module_get_next_page return value (expects it to be NULL in the errorcase, whereas it is actually an error pointer).

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
